circumstances:
The crew was performing a circular training flight from RAF East Wretham. During the take off run, the left engine failed. The captain decided to abandon the take off procedure and attempted an emergency braking action, but the aircraft was unable to stop within the remaining runway. It overrun, hit obstacles, lost its landing gears and came to rest. While all six occupants were unhurt, the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
Crew:
P/O Josef Čapka, pilot, 
Sgt Ferdinand Kepka, pilot,
Sgt Josef Laichler, 
Sgt Jan Neradil, 
Sgt Gustav Michalec, air gunner  1.
probable_cause: Failure of the left engine during take off run.
